/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with trees and lampposts, stretches out into the distance, flanked by tall buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise majestically against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
